/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on one side and towering buildings on the other. Cars are parked neatly along the sides of the road, adding to the urban charm of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few wispy clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
